channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: How Rama Duwaji, Zohran Mamdani’s wife, helped steer him to victory in New York mayoral elections
Why tariffs are likely to stay even if US Supreme Court rules against Trump
Bilaspur train accident: What caused that deadly collision that killed at least 11 in Chhattisgarh?
Who is Abigail Spanberger, the Democrat who has become the first woman governor of Virginia?
History Today: How Trump achieved a rare presidential feat in 2024
FirstUp: US SC to hear Trump tariff case, Modi to felicitate Women's World Cup-winning team... Top news today
China’s periphery diplomacy and the G2 chimera
item.description: It remains to be seen how China responds to attempts by the US to assert itself along China’s periphery, including in Pakistan, while paying lip service to a so-called G2

item.title: India-US defence deal confirms broader strategic picture beyond occasional setbacks
item.description: The recent India-US framework agreement is a significant step in strengthening bilateral ties and boosting industrial and technological cooperation in the defence sector. It affirms India as a priority partner in America's vision for a free and open Indo-Pacific

item.title: Trishul, Astra Shakti, and the rise of Rudra Brigades: How the armed forces are preparing for tomorrow’s wars
item.description: These exercises will test coordination and cohesion among the three services, as a display of how theatre commands could operate

item.title: Cold War reversed: How Russia’s superweapons are challenging Nato
item.description: It is the psychological warfare that Russian nuclear signalling has always sought to achieve—not just military victory

item.title: Trump’s Asia tour signals change in China approach, India must wait and watch
item.description: For the present, the US’ China policy has become clearer: it will be characterised by conciliation and cooperation rather than confrontation, although consistency is not assured

item.title: India’s magic mix of domestic resilience, global adaptability fuels its economic engine
item.description: Indian economy has weathered global disruptions with relative ease, owing to its diversified structure and policy responsiveness, and that’s where it stands apart
